title: ap-5-consignment_circulation_plan1
text: Appendix 5 : CONSIGNMENT CIRCULATION PLAN 9.30 Collection / Distribution Distribution of consignments to units Collection of consignments from units Collection of internal deliveries Collection of announcements Collection of documents to be signed 10.30 Arrival at HM (From campus) Sorting the consignments Registration Distribution planning of consignments to units Planning internal deliveries Reading and stamping announcements Checking and planning documents to be signed 11.00 Internal Distribution Making internal deliveries Distribution of announcements to bulletin boards Circulation of documents to be signed 11.30 Leaving for Post Office: Consignment delivery and collection 12.30 Arrival at HM (From the Post Office) L U N C H B R E A K 13.00 Sorting Consignments Registration Distribution of consignments to units 14:00 Collection - Distribution Distribution of consignments to units Collection of consignments from units Collection of internal deliveries Collection of announcements Collection of documents to be signed 15:00 Arrival at HM (From campus) Sorting the consignments Registration Reading and stamping announcements Checking and planning documents to be signed Planning internal deliveries 15:30 Leaving for Post Office : Consignment deliveries 16:00 Internal Distribution Making internal deliveries Distribution of announcements to bulletin boards Circulation of documents to be signed 17:00 Arrival at HM (From the Post Office) Daily report and closing procedure
